## PdfView.onModify() method

Is called when the vault has a 'modify' event. Reloads the file if the modified file is the file in this view.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onModify(file: TFile): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

file

</td><td>

TFile

</td><td>

The modified file.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
